column1: Advanced Manufacturing: Technology and Systems MSc
column3: Department of Design, Manufacture & Engineering Management
column5: Manufacturing and engineering are thriving sectors at the heart of the UK economy. They generate jobs, promote economic growth and increase global trade.Manufacturing engineers therefore play a vital role in integrating technology and management within the sector to achieve added value and deliver superior performance.This course is designed for:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
